about_the_game:
Roofz Panda is an action-packed, high-flying adventure where you take control of a fearless ninja panda leaping across the most breathtaking rooftops in the world! From the towering skyscrapers of Hong Kong to the sun-soaked Caribbean Islands and vast open landscapes, every jump is a test of skill, reflexes, and daring precision.

In this fast-paced parkour challenge, you must time your jumps perfectly to avoid falling, collect valuable sushi to boost your score. The rooftops are full of surprises—hidden power-ups, dynamic obstacles, and even secret shortcuts that only the most skilled players will discover.

🏯 Master the Art of the Leap – Use your ninja reflexes to time each jump with precision and keep your momentum going!
🌎 Explore Stunning Locations – From neon-lit urban jungles to tropical paradises, every level is a visual spectacle.
🎮 Easy to Learn, Hard to Master – A simple one-button jump mechanic makes it accessible, but true mastery requires skill and strategy.
🥷 Compete for Glory – Climb the leaderboards, beat your best scores, and challenge friends to see who is the ultimate rooftop ninja!
🐼 Stylish & Adorable – Play as the coolest ninja panda ever, dressed in sleek, unlockable outfits!

Are you ready to test your reflexes, conquer gravity, and become the legendary Roofz Panda? The rooftops are waiting—jump in now! 🚀

name: Roofz Panda

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 54 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: 2.8 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 54 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: None

short_description: 🏃‍♂️💨 Race through an epic parkour endless runner, grabbing sushi, stars, and fruits while competing with others! It’s Flappy Bird on steroids—fast, intense, and crazy addictive. Think you can keep up? Prove it! 🚀🔥
